title: Understanding Pesticide Labels
description: Learn how to read and interpret pesticide labels for safe and effective use.

content.title: Why Labels Matter
content.content: Labels provide essential safety and usage information.

title: Organic Fertilizers 101
description: An introduction to natural and compost-based fertilizers.

content.title: Compost Basics
content.content: Compost enriches soil with organic matter and microbes.

content.title: Vermicomposting

title: Herbicide Application Techniques
description: Learn safe and effective methods for herbicide use.

content.title: Pre-Emergent vs Post-Emergent
content.content: Understand when and how to apply different herbicides.

content.title: Spray Equipment Safety

title: Integrated Pest Management (IPM)
description: Sustainable pest control strategies combining biological and chemical methods.

content.title: What is IPM?
content.content: IPM uses multiple strategies to control pests sustainably.

content.title: Beneficial Insects
content.content: https://dummyimage.com/400x200/fff/333&text=Ladybugs+%26+More

title: Micronutrients in Agriculture
description: Understand the role of micronutrients like Zinc, Boron, and Iron.

content.title: Zinc Deficiency Symptoms
content.content: Zinc deficiency causes stunted growth and yellowing in leaves.

content.title: How to Apply Micronutrients
content.content: Foliar spraying and soil amendment are effective methods.

title: Neem-Based Biopesticides
description: Learn how neem oil is used to repel pests organically.

content.title: Neem's Mode of Action
content.content: Neem disrupts insect hormones and feeding behavior.

content.title: DIY Neem Spray
content.content: Mix 5ml neem oil with 1L water and 1-2 drops of soap.

title: Safe Agrochemical Storage
description: Best practices to store agrochemicals away from children, water, and food.

content.title: Storage Guidelines
content.content: Always store in original containers with labels intact.

content.title: Storage Room Setup
content.content: https://dummyimage.com/400x200/000/fff&text=Storage+Room

title: Balanced Fertilizer Application
description: Avoid overuse and underuse by understanding NPK balance.

content.title: NPK Ratios Explained
content.content: Understand the ratio of Nitrogen, Phosphorus, and Potassium.

content.title: Choosing the Right Blend
content.content: Match NPK ratios with crop stage and soil test results.

title: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
description: Protect yourself when handling chemicals and fertilizers.

content.title: Essential PPE Items
content.content: Use gloves, masks, boots, and coveralls when spraying.

content.title: Cleaning and Reuse
content.content: Wash PPE after each use and store in a clean place.

title: Water-Soluble Fertilizers
description: How to use drip and foliar systems to apply nutrients.

content.title: Benefits of WSF
content.content: Quick absorption and lower wastage through fertigation.

content.title: How to Prepare WSF
content.content: Dissolve exact grams in water as per crop requirements.
